description: Metric published when a message was acknowledged to a consumer with Ack Sampling enabled
title: io.nats.jetstream.metric.v1.consumer_ack

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

stream.description: The name of the stream where the message is stored

consumer.description: The name of the consumer where the message is held

stream_seq.description: The sequence of the message in the stream that were acknowledged

consumer_seq.description: The sequence of the message in the consumer that were acknowledged

ack_time.description: The time it took on the final delivery for the message to be acknowledged in nanoseconds

deliveries.description: The number of deliveries that were attempted before being acknowledged
